body: Because this is in THC, I wonder if we shouldn't consider the `TH_INDEX` (or something like that) to decide if we use 0 or 1-based indexing.
body_html: Because this is in THC, I wonder if we shouldn't consider the TH_INDEX (or something like that) to decide if we use 0 or 1-based indexing.
